desc: Utilized frameworks such as React, React Native, Next.js, and Expo to develop mobile/web applications, integrating with a Node.js backend and Neo4j graph database to serve data to users
Worked as self-directed, solo developer to design, build, and release a test build of an Android application on the Google Play Store within 6 months to advance the business's goals
Designed all user-facing screens and supporting backend API endpoints of both mobile and web applications, with attention to user experience and data security and privacy
Performed optimizations and refactoring of outdated backend code, improving query and API response times by up to 50% and increasing maintainability and readability
Paired with self studies, learned a third language (Korean) to comfortably integrate and work within the business and culture
Conducted daily meetings, product orders, and decision-making of sales and promotions to maintain productivity and ensure performance targets for the store were met
Hired and trained new employees, helping them adapt to the environment, learn how to identify important tasks, and work efficiently
